item.title: 名不见经传的芯片制造商的需求是人工智能长远发展的关键
item.description: 欢迎收看《深度科技》（Tech In Depth），这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日通讯。今天，在我们展望2026年科技趋势的第二篇报道中，伊恩-金（Ian King）写道，与关注市场领头羊英伟达（Nvidia）相比，关注那些不太引人注意的芯片制造商可能是评估人工智能未来的更好方法。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, in the second installment of our reports looking ahead to tech trends in 2026, Ian King writes that watching the less-publicized chipmakers may be a better way of assessing the future of artificial intelligence than keeping an eye on market leader Nvidia.】

item.title: 中美两国在脆弱的贸易休战中迈向 2026 年
item.description: 特朗普和习近平在关税问题上斡旋达成停火协议，但在台湾和稀土等问题上的紧张局势正在加剧【原文：Trump and Xi have brokered a ceasefire on tariffs, but tension is flaring up on issues like Taiwan and rare earths】

item.title: 廉价牛肉的最后堡垒在最新的平价威胁中逐渐消失
item.description: 廉价牛肉可能很快会变得更加遥不可及。巴西是世界上仅存的几个丰富的牛源之一，但它正步入供应萎缩期，这可能会推高全球牛肉价格。【原文：Cheap beef may soon become further out of reach. Brazil, one of the world’s few remaining sources of abundant cattle, is heading into a period of shrinking supplies that could push global prices higher.】

item.title: 只有牛市：每一位华尔街分析师现在都预测股市将反弹
item.description: 在大银行和精品投资店里，一种乐观的共识已经形成：2026 年美国股市将连续第四年上涨，创下近二十年来最长的连涨纪录。【原文：At the big banks and the boutique investment shops, an optimistic consensus has taken hold: the US stock market will rally in 2026 for a fourth straight year, marking the longest winning streak in nearly two decades.】

item.title: 沙特失业率连续第二年攀升，经济遭受重创
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯的失业率自 2018 年以来首次连续两个季度上升，这预示着在王储穆罕默德-本-萨勒曼努力实现经济转型的同时，劳动力状况也更加严峻。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s unemployment rate rose for two consecutive quarters for the first time since 2018, signaling more challenging labor conditions as Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman strives to transform the economy.】

item.title: 空中客车公司快速生产飞机以实现交付目标
item.description: 据熟悉情况的人士透露，空中客车公司（Airbus SE）在今年的最后几天正在快速生产飞机，这家欧洲飞机制造商对实现几周前被迫削减的交付目标信心倍增。【原文：Airbus SE is churning out aircraft at a rapid clip in the final days of the year, with confidence building at the European planemaker that it can achieve the delivery goal it was forced to cut only a few weeks ago, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 为什么白银价格比黄金价格上涨得更快
item.description: 2025 年，随着美国特朗普政府非正统的经济政策让投资者和央行纷纷寻求避险资产，黄金上演了戏剧性的反弹。但现在，白银正在成为焦点。【原文：Gold staged a dramatic rally in 2025 as the US Trump administration’s unorthodox economic policies sent investors and central banks reaching for safe-haven assets. Right now, however, it’s silver that’s stealing the spotlight.】

item.title: 阿联酋矿商 Axis 在几内亚铝土矿争端中索赔 289 亿美元
item.description: 一家总部设在阿拉伯联合酋长国的公司声称自己是几内亚第二大铝土矿生产商，该公司向西非国家提出 289 亿美元的索赔，要求取消其采矿权。【原文：A United Arab Emirates-based company that says it is Guinea’s second-largest bauxite producer filed a $28.9 billion claim against the West African nation for revoking its mining rights.】

item.title: 越南国家银行警告流动性短缺和关税压力
item.description: 越南央行警告说，在 2025 年银行贷款猛增五分之一之后，一些贷款机构正面临流动性短缺问题，并补充说外部因素将使政府的经济目标进一步复杂化。【原文：Vietnam’s central bank warned some lenders are facing liquidity shortages after bank loans jumped a fifth in 2025, adding that external factors will further complicate the government’s economic targets.】

item.title: 里约、福特斯库改变中国铁矿石定价基准
item.description: 全球最大的两家铁矿石生产商力拓集团（Rio Tinto Group）和福特斯库有限公司（Fortescue Ltd）已经改变了它们为全球最大的大宗商品消费国定价的指数，这是在国家支持的买家中国矿产资源集团（China Mineral Resources Group）公开批评现行机制之后做出的罕见改变。【原文：Rio Tinto Group and Fortescue Ltd, two of the world’s largest iron ore producers, have switched the index they use to price shipments for the world’s largest commodities consumer, a rare change that follows public criticism of the current mechanism from state-backed buyer China Mineral Resources Group.】

item.title: 毛里求斯央行行长称增长不应依赖利率
item.description: 新上任的毛里求斯中央银行行长表示，这个印度洋国家面临着顽固的通货膨胀，不能依靠降低利率来刺激经济增长。【原文：The newly appointed governor of Mauritius’s central bank said that the Indian Ocean nation — facing stubborn inflation — cannot rely on lower interest rates to spur economic growth.】

item.title: 投资者关注乌克兰和谈，欧洲股市保持稳定
item.description: 由于交易商关注围绕乌克兰潜在和平协议的谈判，欧洲股市表现低迷。【原文：European stocks were muted as traders monitored negotiations around a potential peace deal in Ukraine.】

item.description: 英国停滞不前的房地产市场出人意料地刺激了销售家居装饰产品的公司。【原文：Britain’s stagnant housing market is giving an unexpected boost to companies that sell home-improvement products.】

item.title: 年底金属大涨，铁矿石接近 11 月以来最佳收盘价
item.description: 铁矿石期货将创下 11 月底以来的最高收盘价，搭上了金属年底大涨的顺风车，因为交易商们期待着中国政府可能提供的政策支持。【原文：Iron ore futures were set for their highest close since late November, riding a broader year-end rally in metals as traders look ahead to potential policy support from Beijing.】

item.title: 泰铢创五月份以来最大跌幅，交易商警惕干预风险
item.description: 泰国铢创下七个月来的最大跌幅，在泰铢连续六周上涨后，交易商开始警惕当局可能采取的干预措施。【原文：Thailand’s baht fell the most in seven months, with traders on alert for possible intervention by authorities after the currency capped six straight weeks of gains.】

item.title: 软银即将收购数据中心投资公司 DigitalBridge
item.description: 据知情人士透露，软银集团公司（SoftBank Group Corp）正在就收购数字桥集团公司（DigitalBridge Group Inc.【原文：SoftBank Group Corp. is in advanced talks to acquire DigitalBridge Group Inc., a private equity firm that invests in assets such as data centers, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 南非局势稳定，兰特将创 16 年来最大涨幅
item.description: 由于美元走软，加上国内政治稳定，南非兰特有望在年底创下自 2009 年以来的最大涨幅。【原文：South Africa’s rand is poised to end the year with the biggest jump since 2009 as the dollar’s weakness, combined with political stability at home, bolstered the nation’s allure for investors.】

item.title: 阿斯彭出售 16 亿美元亚洲资产，创 25 年最大涨幅
item.description: 非洲最大的制药商阿斯彭药业控股有限公司（Aspen Pharmacare Holdings Ltd.）表示，将以 265 亿兰特（16 亿美元）的价格向一家澳大利亚私募股权公司出售其在亚太地区（不包括中国）的资产，此后该公司的股价创下四分之一世纪以来的最大涨幅。【原文：Aspen Pharmacare Holdings Ltd. rallied the most in a quarter-century after Africa’s biggest drugmaker said it will sell its assets in the Asia-Pacific region excluding China to an Australian private equity firm for 26.5 billion rand ($1.6 billion).】

item.title: 中国将为数字人民币支付利息以促进其应用
item.description: 经过大约十年的开发和测试，中国即将开始为其官方数字货币支付利息，以推动更多的人使用这种货币。【原文：China is about to start paying interest on its official digital currency in a fresh push to get more people to use it after about a decade of development and testing.】

item.title: 发行商追逐海外估值，泰国 IPO 旱或将持续
item.description: 一位高级官员说，泰国陷入困境的首次公开募股市场将继续低迷，因为该国的市场改革需要时间来避免公司在其他地方上市。【原文：Thailand’s beleaguered initial public offering scene is set to remain subdued as the country’s market revamp needs time to stave off companies listing elsewhere, a senior official said.】

item.title: 中国国家媒体警告不要对人民币下单边赌注
item.description: 中国国家媒体警告不要对人民币进行单向押注，这表明官方对人民币近期的上涨速度越来越感到不安。【原文：Chinese state media has cautioned against making one-way bets on the yuan, signaling growing official discomfort about the pace of recent gains in the currency.】

item.title: 英国假期后伦敦铜价反弹至创纪录的 13,000 美元附近
item.description: 伦敦金属交易所的铜价在休市两天后以看涨形式重新开盘，价格大涨近 7%，创下历史新高。【原文：Copper reopened in bullish form after a two-day break on the London Metal Exchange, with prices surging nearly 7% to an all-time high.】

item.title: Coupang 为数据泄露受害者提供 10 亿美元赔偿
item.description: Coupang 将向受韩国有史以来最大数据泄露事件影响的所有客户提供价值超过 10 亿美元的赔偿。【原文：Coupang is offering compensation worth more than $1 billion to all customers affected by South Korea’s biggest-ever data breach.】
